description:
Voice Memos for webOS is the highest rated voice memo app for HP webOS in the Palm App Catalog at this time. It is full featured, and has several planned features & updates.

Some features:
* Record new memos
* View list of memos, or view them in "Card View" similar to how you can swap between apps
* Quick Play feature (1-tap playing)
* Spinning spools while recording notes (on webOS 2.0.0/2.0.1, it may stutter at the beginning)
* Ability to give a title and/or description to the note AND edit them later (while viewing the memos)
* Emailing of memos
* Themes (Light, Dark, Palm Default, and Palm Dark)
* Deletion of memos (plus, now deletes the actual file)
* Choice of playing memos in-app or in the Media Player app on your device
* 3 choices for quality - High, Medium, or Low (High is 705Kbps, Medium is 256Kbps, and Low is 128Kbps)
* Various customizations of app UI
* Choice of file name format (4 formats) based on the date and time
* Ability to automatically start recording when you tap on the new memo button
* Choose the memo quality on a per-note basis
* Ability to sort notes by Recorded Time or Name
* Ability to choose whether or not to hide the memo files from webOS (mainly used so you don't have to listen to memos while listening to music)


Please note:
* All memos are saved in .WAV format (cannot be changed at this time)

Future updates will bring:
* Syncing with online services (like Dropbox)
* Sending of memos through other methods (such as MMS, et al)
